TopicTitle: Denson aerospace: A Space program built on hopes and dreams.

Articles.Content:
This will be a Kerbal space program career mode playthrough, but weird, here's the jist of it.  
I will be playing heavily modified Ksp with a good amount of the tech tree "Unlocked". I will use the setting where you have to pay for new tech to ease the pain of career mode.  Instead of unlocking the early tech tree through science I will be paying for my new tech. I see this as a more logical system because, in my space program, this isn't the first time we've been to space! I will be posting updates and mission reports here for Denson aerospace here.
Ok, quick question, how do I turn on entry cost for new tech?
